headline: 90,000 Jews Gather to Pray and to Defy a Wave of Hate
abstract: A celebration to mark the end of a cycle of Talmudic study carried extra meaning in the wake of deadly anti-Semitic attacks.
lead_paragraph: EAST RUTHERFORD, N.J. â€” For the past century, thousands of Jews have participated in a shared and daunting religious feat, reading the same page of the Talmud every day until they finish all 38 volumes of that central text of Jewish religious law and rabbinical debates. The task takes almost seven and a half years to complete and ends in a colossal party.
